mapper.insert:
select NVL(max(iata_key), 0) + 1 from iata_code
INSERT IGNORE INTO iata_code (iata_key, iata_code, city, country, country_ko) VALUES (#{iata_key}, #{iataCode}, #{city}, #{country}, #{countryKo})

select NVL(max(air_num), 0) + 1 from airplaneInfo
INSERT IGNORE INTO airplaneInfo (air_num, country, airplane_name, iata_code, icao_code, hub_airport, airplane, destination, airline_alliance, logo) VALUES (#{air_key},#{country}, #{airplaneName}, #{iataCode}, #{icaoCode}, #{hubAirport}, #{airplane}, #{destination}, #{airlineAlliance}, #{logo})
